cause.description:
Remember when you were younger and you played "Punch Buggy". I do. I think it was more of an excuse to punch my siblings though.
But when I think about it, I don't see very many around any more. They are my favourite car and now they are going extinct. Forget the whales or the seals, help me save a Beetle.
1. Beetle extinction must be prevented
2. Beetle life is a universal right
cause.name: Dave's Car Fund
